name: template-start-scripts
description: Start scripts for a project containing frontend and backend with dev scripts each

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c green,blue -t "HH:mm:ss" -p "[{time} • {name}]	" "npm --prefix ./backend run dev" "npm --prefix ./frontend run dev"
scripts.test: echo "Error: no test script, create one to run tests across your packages" && exit 1
scripts.build: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c green,blue -t "HH:mm:ss" -p "[{time} • {name}]	" "npm --prefix ./backend run build" "npm --prefix ./frontend run build"
scripts.start: echo "Error: start script missing, you can define one to run built packages" && exit 1

author: David Alexander Pfeiffer (davidmc971)
